title: @Meddler, Any follow ups on future plans for Cassiopeia?
body: The Cassiopeia fan-base has remained quite still since you said she may be getting some buffs early in the next year, I suppose that's because you would like to see how she is developing this preseason. So, how do you guys find her? do you think she'll need changes (her theme being the main concern of the cassiopeia's playerbase, with her not feeling like a poison mage)? or do you think she is k? I think she could use some love in future work. Thank you.

replies.body: {{champion:82}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:72}} If not, she can join our club.

> [{quoted}](name=Troy242621,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ddV8JE1B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-09T03:21:27.522+0000)
>
